mean_cn: adj. 课外的，业余的，婚外的
mean_en: used to describe extra activities (such as sports) that can be done by the students in a school but that are not part of the regular schedule of classes
word_etyma: extra以外的+ curricul(um)课程+ar...的 → 课外的；业余的；婚外的
short_phrase: Guitar is one of his extracurricular activities.
sentence: I'm a professor of mathematical philosophy. I also have a extracurricular interest: I play the guitar.
sentence_trans: 我是一名专业的数理哲学教授。我也有一个业余爱好：弹吉他。
